channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- jbossas
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat, Inc. -- jbossas

item.title: CVE-2017-12149|2024-08-05T18:28:16.644Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- jbossas
item.description: In Jboss Application Server as shipped with Red Hat Enterprise Application Platform 5.2, it was found that the doFilter method in the ReadOnlyAccessFilter of the HTTP Invoker does not restrict classes for which it performs deserialization and thus allowing an attacker to execute arbitrary code via crafted serialized data.
